root.desc: 本次更新添加了大量有♂趣的东西。 Exciting 一颗赛艇

lib.script: @echo off echo ================Mod Installer================ echo Written By Kenvix @ 2016/2/1 IF NOT EXIST "{{Root}}/mods" MD "{{Root}}/mods" cd {{Root}}/mods del /f /q *.zip del /f /q *.jar del /f /q *.disabled {{7z}} x -y -o"{{Root}}/mods" {{DLDir}}/package.mods.7z del /f /q {{DLDir}}/package.mods.7z echo ===============Mods Installed================

@echo off echo ===========Optional Mod Installer============ echo Written By Kenvix @ 2016/2/1 IF NOT EXIST "{{Root}}/mods/1.7.10" MD "{{Root}}/mods/1.7.10" cd {{Root}}/mods/1.7.10 del /f /q *.moecraft.jar del /f /q *.moecraft.jar.disabled del /f /q *.moecraft.zip del /f /q *.moecraft.zip.disabled {{7z}} x -y -o"{{Root}}/mods" {{DLDir}}/package.mods.7z del /f /q {{DLDir}}/package.omods.7z echo ===========Optional Mods Installed===========
